Title: Online Experienced Short-Form Video Editor

We’re hiring an experienced, short-form video editor to join our fun, dynamic team full-time!



GENERAL JOB DESCRIPTION

This position is full-time with room for growth (senior VE positions available).

As a remote role, you have the flexibility to work from any location, while aligning with our official time zone, EST Time (UK).



ABOUT SIMPLEX MEDIA

We are experts in the management and growth of social media accounts for personal & business brands on track to be the BEST in the industry.

We are a young, fun, dynamic team who prioritizes growth for clients and our teaUpgrade to see actual infombers (professionally and personally)

Website: Upgrade to see actual info/



HOW WE OPERATE AS A TEAM

We’re a team of 20 people currently.

We are remote, operating on a UK timezone.

Communication is streamlined through tools such as Slack, ClickUp, and Loom for transparency and efficiency.

We prioritize learning and development (both personally and professionally).

We also value fun and collaboration and have regular games sessions.



ROLE OBJECTIVE

In this role, you create engaging short-form videos to be posted on social media. You will work alongside a strategist who will guide the vision for the reels.

You will be expected to create 6 (1 min) reels per working shift for this role. This means that we are looking for A-players!



REQUIRED SKILLS

Experienced in Adobe Premiere Pro.

Experienced in After Effects.

Skilled using Photoshop.

Proficient in English.

Proficiency in using collaboration tools like ClickUp/Notion and Slack for team coordination is a BONUS!



REQUIRED PERSONAL TRAITS

The individuals we are looking for are:

Passionate about creating super engaging videos!

LOVE social media and are up to date with the latest social media editing trends.

Keen to experiment and try new editing techniques.

Super organised and capable of multitasking.

Proactive and innovative, always looking for solutions.

Fast-paced executors who deliver quality results within tight deadlines.

Accountable, taking full ownership of their responsibilities and outcomes.

Excellent communicators, maintaining transparency and fostering a collaborative team environment.

Adaptable, remaining flexible to the evolving landscape of social media marketing and responsive to feedback and changes.
